success.registered: Your account has been successfully created.

error.expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

error.went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again later.
error.field_error: One or more fields have errors.

not_found.title: Oops! Page not found
not_found.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

lang.title: section for language selector
lang.help_text: Select the language you use on {companyName}

mixed.oneOf: The value must be one of the following: {values}.
mixed.notOneOf: The value must not be one of the following: {values}.

string.length: The field must be exactly {length} characters long.
string.min: The field must be at least {min} characters long.
string.max: The field must be at most {max} characters long.
string.matches: The value must match the following pattern: "{regex}".
string.email: Please enter a valid email address.
string.trim: The value must not contain leading or trailing spaces.
string.lowercase: The value must be in lowercase.
string.uppercase: The value must be in uppercase.

number.min: The value must be greater than or equal to {min}.
number.max: The value must be less than or equal to {max}.
number.lessThan: The value must be less than {less}.
number.moreThan: The value must be more than {more}.
number.positive: The value must be a positive number.
number.negative: The value must be a negative number.
number.integer: The value must be an integer.

date.min: The date must be later than or equal to {min}.
date.max: The date must be earlier than or equal to {max}.

array.min: The array must have at least {min} items.
array.max: The array must have at most {max} items.
array.length: The array must have exactly {length} items.

object.noUnknown: The object contains keys that are not allowed: {unknown}.
